segments.text: He has a long head , I bet he will do well in his business .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He does , he started five years ago and now ends up the richest among us .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: When we were students , he was no good in any subject .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It seemed to be useless to study well when we were young if we examine his case .
segments.speaker: S2
